Class Xp

Represents the XP module of the bot, handling various XP-related commands and configurations.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Xp
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
public class Xp : MewdekoModuleBase<XpService>, IModuleBase
Remarks

The XP module includes commands for setting up XP earning rates, managing XP roles and rewards, adjusting notification settings, excluding users/roles/channels from earning XP, and more.

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

Xp(DownloadTracker, XpConfigService, InteractiveService, BotConfigService, DbService)

Represents the XP module of the bot, handling various XP-related commands and configurations.

Declaration
public Xp(DownloadTracker tracker, XpConfigService xpconfig, InteractiveService serv, BotConfigService bss, DbService db)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DownloadTracker tracker

A service for tracking downloads.
XpConfigService xpconfig

A service for managing XP configuration settings.
InteractiveService serv

An interactive service for creating interactive prompts and pagination.
BotConfigService bss

A service for accessing and managing bot configurations.
DbService db

A service for interacting with the database.
Remarks

The XP module includes commands for setting up XP earning rates, managing XP roles and rewards, adjusting notification settings, excluding users/roles/channels from earning XP, and more.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Experience(IGuildUser?)

Generates and sends an XP image for a specified user.

Declaration
[Cmd("Experience")]
[Aliases("Experience")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Experience(IGuildUser? user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuildUser user

The user for whom to generate the XP image. If null, the XP image is generated for the command invoker.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of generating and sending the XP image.
Remarks

This command creates an image displaying the user's current XP level and other related information, then sends this image to the channel where the command was invoked.

| Edit this page View Source

SetXpImage(string)

Sets the XP image for the server.

Declaration
[Cmd("SetXpImage")]
[Aliases("SetXpImage")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
public Task SetXpImage(string url = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string url

The URL of the image to set as the XP image. If null, the method attempts to use an attachment from the message.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting the XP image.
Remarks

This command allows server administrators to set a custom image that is displayed in XP-related messages. If a URL is not provided, the command looks for an image attachment in the message.

| Edit this page View Source

SyncRewards()

Synchronizes the role rewards for the user based on their current XP level.

Declaration
[Cmd("SyncRewards")]
[Aliases("SyncRewards")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[Ratelimit(60)]
public Task SyncRewards()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of syncing XP role rewards.
Remarks

This command checks the user's current XP level and applies any role rewards they should have based on that level. It's useful for ensuring users have all the roles they are entitled to according to their XP level.

TemplateConfig(string, string, string)

Updates or displays the template configuration for the server.

Declaration
[Cmd("TemplateConfig")]
[Aliases("TemplateConfig")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task TemplateConfig(string property = null, string subProperty = null, string value = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string property

The property to update or display. Can be null to display all properties.
string subProperty

The subproperty to update within the specified property. Can be null.
string value

The value to set for the property or subproperty. Can be null if no value is provided.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of updating or displaying the template configuration.
Remarks

This command allows server administrators to view and modify various configuration settings related to templates.

XpExclude(Channel, IChannel?)

Toggles whether a channel is excluded from earning XP.

Declaration
[Cmd("XpExclude")]
[Aliases("XpExclude")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task XpExclude(Xp.Channel _, IChannel? channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Xp.Channel _
IChannel channel

The channel to toggle exclusion for. If null, the current channel is used.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of toggling channel XP exclusion.
Remarks

This command allows server administrators to toggle whether a specific channel is excluded from earning XP. If no channel is specified, the command applies to the current channel where it was invoked.

Displays the server leaderboard based on XP levels.

Declaration

[Aliases("XpLeaderboard")]
[MewdekoOptions(typeof(LbOpts))]
[Priority(1)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]

Parameters
Type Name Description
string[] args

Arguments for customizing the leaderboard display.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of displaying the server XP leaderboard.
Remarks

This command shows a leaderboard of users in the server ranked by their XP levels. It allows for customization of the leaderboard display using various arguments.

| Edit this page View Source

XpNotify()

Sets or gets the notification setting for XP level-ups.

Declaration
[Cmd("XpNotify")]
[Aliases("XpNotify")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task XpNotify()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting or getting the XP notification setting.
Remarks

Without parameters, this command displays the current notification setting for XP level-ups. With parameters, it updates the notification setting to either notify in a server channel, via DM, or disable notifications altogether.

| Edit this page View Source

XpNotify(NotifyPlace, XpNotificationLocation)

Sets the notification setting for XP level-ups.

Declaration
[Cmd("XpNotify")]
[Aliases("XpNotify")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task XpNotify(Xp.NotifyPlace place, XpNotificationLocation type)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Xp.NotifyPlace place

The place to set the notification setting for. Can be Server (Guild) or Global.
XpNotificationLocation type

The type of notification to set. Can be Server (Guild) or Global.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting the XP notification.
Remarks

This command allows users to set the notification preferences for XP level-ups, either for the current server or globally across all servers where the bot is present.

XpRoleReward(int, IRole?)

Sets or clears an XP role reward for reaching a specified level.

Declaration
[Cmd("XpRoleReward")]
[Aliases("XpRoleReward")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task XpRoleReward(int level, IRole? role = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int level

The XP level for which to set or clear the reward.
IRole role

The role to set as a reward for reaching the specified level. If null, the reward for the level is cleared.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting or clearing an XP role reward.
Remarks

This command allows server administrators to configure roles as rewards for users reaching specific XP levels.

XpSetting(string?, int)

Updates XP settings for the server or displays the current settings if no parameters are specified.

Declaration
[Cmd("XpSetting")]
[Aliases("XpSetting")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
public Task XpSetting(string? setting = null, int value = 999999999)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string setting

The setting to update. Can be null to display current settings.
int value

The new value for the setting. Use 999999999 as a default placeholder to indicate no change.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of updating or displaying XP settings.
Remarks

This command allows for the adjustment of various XP-related settings, such as the rate at which XP is earned. If no parameters are specified, it displays the current XP settings for the server.
